properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 2:50AM MST until January 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of up
to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph resulting in
localized blizzard or near-blizzard conditions with blowing snow
near and through mountain passes and exposed locations.

* WHERE...Gallatin, Beaverhead and Madison.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and blowing snow will result in near-
whiteout conditions at times in exposed locations and through
the passes. Plan on slippery road conditions. Increased
avalanche danger is also possible.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on
young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local
Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
